column5: 1600 sq ft house in League City, TX, a great location in the southern suburbs of Houston.  Amenities: Pool Table, Ping Pong Table, Trampoline  Location: 29 miles to downtown Houston. 3 miles to Kemah Boardwalk (great local attraction) 24 miles to Galveston Island (beach, fishing, etc)
column8: League City, TX Rental 3 bedroom, 2 baths.
